antcolony
Class Simulation

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JPanel
                  antcolony.Simulation
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Runnable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
public class Simulation
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements java.lang.Runnable

Wrapping class for the main functions in the application. This class contains the main components for running the following functions:

  • Run a simulation.
  • Paint the canvas of the grid.
  • Measure the results.
  • Write the result file.

Since:
1.0
Version:
1.8
Author:
António Fonseca
See Also:
Serialized Form
